job.title: UX Designer (m/w/d)
job.body:
What You'll Do

  • Develop and maintain high-performance applications
  • Work on cutting-edge technologies and frameworks
  • Collaborate with product and design teams
  • Contribute to technical documentation and knowledge sharing

What We're Looking For

  • Strong background in software engineering
  • Experience with modern web technologies
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills
  • Passion for learning and staying current with industry trends

job.body:
Responsibilities

  • Design and implement scalable software solutions
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams on innovative projects
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
  • Participate in code reviews and technical discussions

Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
  • 3+ years of experience in software development
  • Strong knowledge of modern programming languages
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)

job.title: Data Scientist (m/w/d)
job.body:
Key Responsibilities

  • Lead the development of new features and products
  • Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
  • Optimize application performance and scalability
  • Implement best practices and coding standards

Qualifications

  • 5+ years of professional software development experience
  • Expertise in system architecture and design patterns
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Experience with microservices architecture

  • Lead the development of new features and products
  • Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
  • Optimize application performance and scalability
  • Implement best practices and coding standards

Qualifications

  • 5+ years of professional software development experience
  • Expertise in system architecture and design patterns
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Experience with microservices architecture
